mapper.insert:
insert into tb_nav_base
nav_name, nav_type, nav_level, nav_icon, nav_order_num, nav_status, parent_id, create_time,
#{navName}, #{navType}, #{navLevel}, #{navIcon}, #{navOrderNum}, #{navStatus}, #{parentId}, #{createTime},
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
mapper.select: select , pn.id as "parent.id", pn.nav_name as "parent.navName" from tb_nav_base n left join tb_nav_base pn on n.parent_id = pn.id where n.id = #{id}

select , pn.id as "parent.id", pn.nav_name as "parent.navName" from tb_nav_base n left join tb_nav_base pn on n.parent_id = pn.id where 1 = 1 and n.nav_name like CONCAT('%',#{navName},'%') and n.parent_id = #{parent.id} ORDER BY n.nav_order_num DESC,n.create_time desc

SELECT , pn.id as "parent.id", pn.nav_name as "parent.navName" FROM tb_nav_base n WHERE n.nav_type = 1 from tb_nav_base n left join tb_nav_base pn ON n.parent_id = pn.id WHERE n.nav_type=0 AND n.nav_level=0 AND n.nav_status=0

SELECT
, pn.id as "parent.id", pn.nav_name as "parent.navName" FROM tb_nav_base n LEFT JOIN tb_nav_base pn ON n.parent_id = pn.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND n.nav_type = 1 AND (n.nav_level = 0 OR n.nav_level = 1) AND n.nav_status = 0

update.foreach: UPDATE tb_nav_base set nav_status = #{navBase.navStatus} where id = #{navBase.id}

SELECT id, nav_name FROM tb_nav_base WHERE nav_type != 2 AND nav_level = 0 AND nav_status = 0 ORDER BY nav_order_num desc
SELECT id, nav_name FROM tb_nav_base WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} AND nav_status = 0 ORDER BY nav_order_num desc

select , u.url "navUrl.url", u.target "navUrl.target" from tb_nav_base n left join tb_base_url u on n.id = u.nav_id where n.nav_level = 0 and n.nav_status = 0 order by nav_order_num DESC,n.create_time DESC
SELECT , sm.menu_head_icon "navSecondMenu.menuHeadIcon" FROM tb_nav_base n LEFT JOIN tb_nav_second_menu sm ON n.id = sm.nav_id where n.id = #{id}
